text: , formerly known as Itazuke Air Base, is a Japanese airport in Fukuoka. The airport is in Hakata, which is south-east of the city center. No other airport in Japan is so close to the central part of the city as Fukuoka Airport.Fukuoka/Hakata Tourist Information Site, Fukuoka International Airport. Retrieved 2011-1-20. Fukuoka is officially a second class airport.About Fukuoka Airport . Retrieved 2012-1-20. It is operating at full capacity, and cannot be further expanded. Fukuoka Airport is the fourth busiest passenger airport in Japan. == Related pages == * List of airports in Japan ==References== == Other websites == *Fukuoka Airport website Category:Airports in Japan Category:Fukuoka Prefecture
title: Fukuoka Airport
